content: CLAIRE was officially launched on 18 June 2018. In the days leading up to our 2nd anniversary next week, we will share with you what we are excited about in terms of the things we've accomplished so far and those we're working on right now. Stay tuned!
Since 2018, CLAIRE is pursuing an ambitious vision for European excellence in #AI (see https://claire-ai.org/#vision). What's your biggest hope for the future of AI in Europe? EaU0rFmXkAcI1T1.jpeg

Earlier this year, we've formally established CLAIRE as a non-profit international association ... 277 labs and organisations, jointly employing 15000 AI researchers and support staff, have already become members! That's a lot of growth since we started in 2018. EaU2M5KWAAQgLNN.jpeg

Critical mass for #AI in Europe has to be achieved at the European level. At #CLAIRE, we were therefore thrilled when in February 2020, the @EU_Commission released a white paper embracing all key elements of the CLAIRE vision. Have a look at our response: claire-ai.org/ec-wp-response/

And here is the official update on a selection of things we've accomplished over the last 12 months, as well as some current projects and new developments - enjoy! https://claire-ai.org/updates/

CLAIRE Updates
Updates 2020/06/18 CLAIRE 2nd Anniversary UpdateA mere 24 months ago, on 18 June 2018, CLAIRE was officially launched. It’s amazing to see how far we’ve come since then. Here are some of the things we’ve accomplished in the past year, along with updates on several exciting ongoing

And if you haven't seen our revamped website (released today), check it out: https://claire-ai.org

Home | CLAIRE
Confederation of Laboratories for Artificial Intelligence Research in Europe Excellence across all of AI.
